bill.summary:
Repatriation Assistance Act of 2019
This bill authorizes the Department of Homeland Security (DHS) to provide foreign governments with financial assistance through FY2023 for operations to stop individuals who may pose a national security, border security, or terrorist threat to the United States.
DHS and the Department of State shall jointly develop and implement such financial assistance.
